item.title: Xintra APT Emulation Lab - Waifu University ♡ (＞ω＜)
item.description: Complete investigation of the APT Emulation Lab Waifu University by Xintra Labs. This is a deep dive into the threat hunt of the AlphV/BlackCat ransomware group!

item.title: [FCSC 2019] - 3615 Incident (3/3)
item.description: Solution to the last challenge in the 3615 Incident series published at FCSC 2019.

item.title: [FCSC 2019] - 3615 Incident (2/3)
item.description: Solution to the second challenge in the 3615 Incident series published at FCSC 2019.

item.title: [FCSC 2019] - 3615 Incident (1/3)
item.description: Solution to the first challenge in the 3615 Incident series, published at FCSC 2019.

item.title: Malware Analysis : WannaCry (part 1)
item.description: Walkthrough of my malware analysis for the Bossfight challenge from the Practical Malware Analysis & Triage course created by @HuskyHacks. This time, I dive into the infamous WannaCry, a great challenge to apply everything I’ve learnt from now on !

item.title: Malware Analysis : SikoMode
item.description: Walkthrough of my malware analysis for the SikoMode challenge from the Practical Malware Analysis & Triage course created by @HuskyHacks. This time, I dive into advanced static and dynamic analysis using Cutter and x64dbg."

item.title: Malware Analysis : SillyPutty
item.description: Walkthrough of my malware analysis for the SillyPutty challenge from the Practical Malware Analysis & Triage course created by @HuskyHacks. I only used basic static and dynamic analysis methods and tools.

item.title: [BreizhCTF 2023] - Yakuza Serie
item.description: Solution to the OSINT challenges I created for BreizhCTF 2023.

item.title: [ESAIP CTF 2022] - The Proof of the Malware
item.description: Solution of the challenge ‘The Proof of the Malware’ made by Hippie at ESAIP 2022.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: This is just a short post to describe the aim of this blog and what you will find on here. And in case you wondered, yes this title is a reference to Mr. Robot.
